user_instruction: 'Send an update to my coworker Sarah (sarah.thompson@cch.org) about our current projects. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah.thompson@cch.org"],"subject":"Quick Project Status Check-In","body":"Hi Sarah,

Hope you're doing well. Here’s a concise update on our active projects:

• Core Codebase – The latest version has been deployed and the recent processing glitch appears resolved. We’re monitoring stability and outlining tasks for the next sprint.

• Trading Platform Enhancement – The new algorithm is fully integrated and currently undergoing its final round of testing. Early results look promising; once QA signs off we’ll move to staged rollout.

• HEAP Initiative – Drafts for the educational materials are in review and the team is gathering feedback. Next step is to finalize content and plan the first workshop session.

Please let me know if you’d like more detail on any item or have other priorities we should address.

Thanks!
[Your Name]"}
